Html: Hi guys, is it possible to display multiple edges from source node to target node?
Yes, it is possible, but you need to write your own EdgeRouting algorithm to do that. With the actual implementation it displays the multiple edges on top of each other.
Do you mean edge control or edgeRouting... I have only seen one Abstract EdgeRouting algorithm class so far, and that's it.

I meant EdgeRouting algorithm. You need to write your own EdgeRouting algorithm that gives back different routes for the edges between the same nodes.
You don't need to modify the Edge Control, if it gets the proper route, coordinates from the routing algorithm it will display the edges properly.
Should I do so by implementing a SimpleTreeLayout with the IEdgeRouting interface?
